name: The Philosophers sword
description: A powerful sword that was wielded by a great king from the kingdom of Rohan. This sword will deal damage of -15hp to any monster that comes across it.

name: The Queen’s Jewel
description: A rare gemstone from a dynasty of royalty. Putting this ring on will regenerate a player’s HP% Faster.

name: Sharks tooth
description: A tooth from the notorious megalodon. Equipping this gives a 10% boost to players damage

name: Ancient vase
description: King Tut’s favorite vase. It is rumored that whoever possesses it is doomed for eternity. Lowers players defense by 10% if equipped

name: Crystal skull
description: A crystal skull that was taken by Indiana Jones himself.

name: Aegis Shield
description: A magical shield that was once carried by the Greek god Zeus.

name: Ragnarok
description: A God-Slaying Divine sword fused from rage of the gods, capable of mass destruction. Equipping this sword allows the player to do -30 damage to an enemy.

name: Broken Sword and Shield
description: A broken and rusted pair of armory, it looks like it belongs to the statue nearby.

name: Key
description: A key that fits many keyholes, but only unlocks one.

name: Hourglass
description: A large hourglass with time slowly ticking.

name: Dynamite
description: A large explosive that can be used to tear down large walls.
